nodes.documentation: @dev Events
nodes.name: lottoInitialized

nodes.documentation: @dev Constructor
@dev Helper/Getter functions
nodes.name: getTicketAmount

nodes.documentation: @dev Initialize the lottery with the appropriate values. Only available to contract owner.
nodes.name: initialize

nodes.documentation: @dev Give a free first ticket to anyone who has been verified. verification is done off-chain and the owner calls the function. (OnlyOwner)
nodes.name: freeTicket

nodes.documentation: @dev Buy an amount of tickets based on the amount of ether sent and the ticket price. Available to      all lottery participants.
nodes.name: buyTicket

nodes.documentation: @dev Oraclize callback function
nodes.name: __callback

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Oraclize query was sent. Standing by for response."

arguments.value: Oraclize query was sent. Standing by for response.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Oraclize query was sent. Standing by for response."

nodes.documentation:
@dev Oraclize query to random.org. Fetches one random number between 0 and the
total amount of tickets purchased. Returns the value in the callback above and calls the winner.
nodes.name: drawWinner

nodes.documentation: @dev Get the lottery winner and return their address.
nodes.name: getWinner

nodes.documentation: @dev Setters and getters for queries.
nodes.name: _setQuery2

nodes.documentation: @dev Withdraw function. Only owner can withdraw contract funds.
nodes.name: withdraw

nodes.documentation: @dev Fallback function. Refunds ether to sender unless they are the owner.
